africagem: So if you were thin then you would deserve to use the wheelchair?🤦🏾‍♀️ Humans are just...I mean damned if you do and damned if to don’t. They will talk about you anyway.
karenwalcottwrites: I can’t walk longer than ten minutes either. I’m big and I always castigate myself for that issue. It sucks.

vhope_m: I'm so sorry 😔 I've been out at the store and had to sit down because I become so fatigued and people look at me like I'm nuts just plopped in the middle of a furniture or toy display. singaporeactually: Invisible illness is so hard 💜 sadly nobody will know the struggle unless they or their family members are in the same position. But it’s great that you are raising awareness about it.
